meanings.definition: A biography that analyzes the subject's psychological makeup and behavior.
meanings.sent1: The psychobiography of the famous author delved deep into her mind and emotions.
meanings.sent2: I read a fascinating psychobiography of a renowned scientist last week.
meanings.sent3: The psychobiography of the adventurous explorer was filled with unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a psychobiography, each chapter revealing a new layer of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The psychobiography painted a vivid picture of the artist's inner struggles and triumphs.

meanings.definition: The study of a person's life through the lens of psychology.
meanings.sent1: Psychobiography helps us understand how psychology shapes individuals' experiences.
meanings.sent2: The professor specialized in psychobiography and wrote many insightful papers.
meanings.sent3: Studying psychobiography can be both enlightening and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to life was like a psychobiography, full of psychological insights.
meanings.sent5: The psychobiography of the musician revealed the impact of childhood experiences on creativity.
